casebody.data:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, AS TRUSTEE FOR SOUNDVIEW HOME LOAN TRUST 2006-OPT2, Asset-Backed Certificates, Series 2006-OPT2, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
RICA ENTERPRISES, INC., et al., Defendants,
and
Sophia Costa, Defendant-Petitioner. C-140 September Term 2018
080666 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 5, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005064-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
